title: Bebi Family: Educational apps & games for kids (2-5y.)
text: 7 Fall books to introduce your toddler to changing seasons Read these wonderful books to introduce your child to the wonders of the fall. They will listen, enjoy the journeys of the characters and learn a lot about the changing seasons. Watch preschool kids aged 2-4 have fun playing 15 puzzle baby games *NoAds* Is your toddler learning to walk, eat and play by themselves? And now you'd like them to start recognizing letters and words? Puzzles help kids learn basic concepts, improve physical skills, and learn problem-solving. And if that's not enough - puzzles are just fun! Allow toddlers to learn playing 500+ fun, educational puzzle games *NoAds* Read these wonderful books to introduce your child to the wonders of the fall. They will listen, enjoy the journeys of the characters and learn a lot about the changing seasons. Rituals and routines help children make sense of time, schedule and life. Read all about what psychologists and experts say about scheduling your toddler's day. Learning to use the potty is a window to another level of development. Itâ€™s a challenging task, but with guidance and tips you can create a safe and comfortable environment for your toddler. Do you want to make the game night a cherished tradition in your family? Read more to learn about the benefits of game nights and tips on how to make it work.
